Title: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
Writer: Park Myeong-Chan (comic), Mu-yeong Lee (screenplay), Chan-wook Park (screenplay), Jae-sun Lee (screenplay), Jong-yong Lee (screenplay), Chan-wook Park (character created by: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance,  Vengeance Trilogy)
Actors: Kang-ho Song, Ha-kyun Shin, Doona Bae, Ji-Eun Lim
Plot: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.
